name: The Owner of the Mountain
description:
Run away from one of the most terrifying local legends, The Owner of the Mountain, control the body of a foolish hunter, whose only chance to live is to escape from this abominable monster.

Controls

Swipe Left/Right/Up (Move around)

Press Target icon( change Third Person to First Person Camera)

Press Bow icon (shoot arrow) 

Produced by

Cristian Castro Porras ----> Programmer 
Franklin Jimenez Zuñiga ----> 3D art
